response.overview: A one-hour Halloween special that peels back the layers of the scariest haunted house attraction in America: Thrillvania. While taking you on a step-by-step journey through the build-out of the attraction, industry experts demonstrate how to build, install and use various special effects, lights, sound and sensory tricks to create cost-effective, simple and fun displays for a top-notch Halloween experience.
response.title: Halloween Fright House: Secrets Revealed
